mapper.update: UPDATE TB_WAREHOUSE SET WRHOUS_NM = #{wrHousNm}, WRHOUS_LC = #{wrHousLc}, WRHOUS_DETAIL_ADRES = COALESCE(#{wrHousDetailAdres}, WRHOUS_DETAIL_ADRES), WRHOUS_ZIP = #{wrHousZip}, WRHOUS_OPER_STTUS = #{wrHousOperSttus}, PARTCLR_MATTER = #{partclrMatter} WHERE WRHOUS_CODE = #{wrHousCode}

SELECT WRHOUS_CODE AS wrHousCode, WRHOUS_NM AS wrHousNm, WRHOUS_LC AS wrHousLc, COALESCE(WRHOUS_DETAIL_ADRES, '') AS wrHousDetailAdres, WRHOUS_ZIP AS wrHousZip, WRHOUS_OPER_STTUS AS wrHousOperSttus, PARTCLR_MATTER AS partclrMatter FROM TB_WAREHOUSE WHERE 1=1
AND WRHOUS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wrHousNm}, '%')
AND WRHOUS_LC LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wrHousLc}, '%')
AND WRHOUS_OPER_STTUS = #{wrHousOperSttus}
ORDER BY WRHOUS_NM ASC
